title: Remove uploaded WhatsApp image from site galleries

requirements.text: Remove the uploaded image "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3" from the website so it is no longer displayed anywhere (including the Major Projects page 'Ongoing Projects (Gallery)' section), and ensure no broken image references remain.

quotes: remove this image from the website

acceptanceCriteria: The image "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3" no longer appears on any page, including the Major Projects page ongoing projects gallery.
The Major Projects page (route "/projects") loads without any broken images in the ongoing projects gallery grid.

No remaining code references exist to either "/assets/WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3.jpeg" or the uploaded filename "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3.jpg" (account for either extension if present in assets).

requirements.text: Remove the static asset file for the uploaded image from the frontend public assets if it exists and is not referenced elsewhere after REQ-33 (so it is not shipped with the site build).

quotes: remove this image from the website

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image file ("WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3.jpg") is removed from frontend public assets (or any assets folder where it was placed) if present.
The production build succeeds and the site has no missing-asset 404s related to the removed image.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep changes limited to removing this specific image and any now-unused asset file(s).
nonGoals: Do not change other gallery images or page layouts beyond what is necessary to remove the specified image.
Do not add new images or replace the removed image with a new one.
